mapper.select:
SELECT release_pay.* FROM( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, r.*, s.psum, IFNULL(SIGN(s.psum-r.release_num), -1) AS res, e.name FROM (select @rownum:=0) as tmp, b_release r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_code, SUM(stock_num) AS psum FROM b_stock GROUP BY product_code ) AS s ON r.product_code = s.product_code LEFT JOIN b_emp e ON r.emp_code = e.emp_code WHERE r.situation = "대기" ) AS release_pay
WHERE rownum > (#{pagenum} - 1 ) * #{amount} and rownum <= #{pagenum} * 20
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM b_release r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_code, SUM(stock_num) AS psum FROM b_stock GROUP BY product_code ) AS s ON r.product_code = s.product_code WHERE r.situation = "대기"

SET @va = 0; SET @va2 = 0; SELECT bbb.* FROM( SELECT aaa.*, (case when cumsum_num <= #{release_num} then "1" when cumsum_num > #{release_num} then "0" END ) AS cumsum_num_check FROM ( SELECT s.pallet_num AS release_list_code, s.product_code, s.stock_num AS release_num, house_code AS house_address, (@va := @va + s.stock_num) AS cumsum_num FROM b_stock s WHERE product_code = #{product_code} AND product_barcode IS NOT NULL ORDER BY arrive_date ) AS aaa ) AS bbb WHERE bbb.cumsum_num_check = 1 UNION SELECT ccc.* FROM( SELECT bbb.* FROM( SELECT aaa.*, (case when cumsum_num <= #{release_num} then "1" when cumsum_num > #{release_num} then "0" END ) AS cumsum_num_check FROM ( SELECT s.pallet_num AS release_list_code, s.product_code, s.stock_num AS release_num, house_code AS house_address, (@va2 := @va2 + s.stock_num) AS cumsum_num FROM b_stock s WHERE product_code = #{product_code} AND product_barcode IS NOT NULL ORDER BY arrive_date ) AS aaa ) AS bbb WHERE bbb.cumsum_num_check = 0 LIMIT 1 ) AS ccc

where rownum > (#{pagenum} - 1 ) * #{amount} and rownum <= #{pagenum} * 20
mapper.update: UPDATE b_stock s join b_house h on s.house_code = h.house_code SET s.arrive_date = NULL, s.stock_num = NULL, s.house_code = NULL, s.product_barcode = NULL, s.product_code = NULL, h.now_quantity = h.now_quantity - 1 WHERE pallet_num = #{release_list_code}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(stock_num) FROM b_stock WHERE product_code = #{data} GROUP BY product_code

SELECT ( case when pg.product_group_type = 'A' then 'false' ELSE 'true' END ) AS tf FROM b_product p LEFT JOIN b_product_group pg ON p.product_group_code = pg.product_group_code WHERE product_code = #{pc_arr}

SELECT ( case when s.total_num >= #{rn_arr} then 't' ELSE #{rn_arr} - s.total_num END ) AS pcs_check FROM b_product p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_code, SUM(stock_num) AS total_num FROM b_stock WHERE product_code = #{pc_arr} ) AS s ON p.product_code = s.product_code WHERE p.product_code = #{pc_arr}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO statement SELECT( case when DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y%m%d') = LEFT(MAX(statement_code),6) then MAX(statement_code)+1 ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y%m%d'),"0001") END) AS statement_code, "출고" AS classification, #{emp_code} AS emp_code, #{emp_name} AS emp_name, #{emp_tel} AS emp_tel, NOW() AS DATE, #{product_code} AS product_code, #{product_name} AS product_name, #{product_country} AS product_country, #{product_business} AS product_business, #{product_price} AS product_price, #{quantity} AS quantity FROM statement
